item.title: 卡尼领导的自由党赢得大选，加元走高
item.description: 由于预计马克-卡尼将在大选中获胜，这位前央行行长将继续担任总理一职，其领导的自由党也将继续执政，加拿大元兑美元上涨。【原文：Canada’s dollar rose against the greenback as Mark Carney was projected to win in the election, keeping the former central banker in the Prime Minister role and his Liberal Party in power.】

item.title: 特朗普加征关税未能抑制对美虾类出口
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 据说 KKR 支持的 InCred 正在与顾问商谈 4.7 亿美元的 IPO 事宜
item.description: 印度贷款公司 InCred Financial Services 正在与潜在的顾问商谈首次公开募股事宜，以筹集约 400 亿卢比（约合 4.7 亿美元）资金。【原文：Indian lending firm InCred Financial Services is in talks with potential advisers for an initial public offering to raise about 40 billion rupees ($470 million), people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行肯特强调近期澳元波动性 "急剧上升
item.description: 澳大利亚储备银行行长助理克里斯托弗-肯特（Christopher Kent）表示，本月早些时候，全球外汇市场波动性 "急剧上升"，因为交易员们正在研究美国宣布的关税措施可能产生的影响，而最近几天则变得 "更加稳定"。【原文：Global foreign exchange markets recorded a “sharp rise” in volatility earlier this month as traders worked through the potential impact of US tariff announcements, before becoming “more settled” in recent days, according to Reserve Bank of Australia Assistant Governor Christopher Kent.】

item.title: 僵尸船正迅速成为委内瑞拉石油贸易的一大特色
item.description: 耶稣受难日当天，一艘满载石油、自称 "瓦拉达 "的老旧超级油轮从委内瑞拉出发，经过两个月的航行，抵达马来西亚以东海域。【原文：On Good Friday, an aging supertanker fully laden with oil and calling itself Varada arrived in the waters to the east of Malaysia after a two-month voyage from Venezuela.】

item.title: 关税战表明亚洲国家需要新的贸易伙伴：亚行行长
item.description: 亚洲开发银行（Asian Development Bank）行长表示，亚洲国家应使其贸易伙伴多样化，并促进国内需求，以确保它们能够渡过当前的全球贸易战。【原文：Asian countries should diversify their trading partners and boost domestic demand to ensure they can ride out the current global trade war, the head of the Asian Development Bank said.】

item.title: 中国誓言坚定立场，敦促各国抵制 "恶霸 "特朗普
item.description: 在特朗普政府暗示可能使用新的贸易工具向中国政府施压之际，中国最高外交官警告各国不要屈服于美国的关税威胁。【原文：China’s top diplomat warned countries against caving into US tariff threats, as the Trump administration hints at the possible use of new trade tools to pressure Beijing.】

item.title: 部分中国出口商在贸易战中加快美元兑换步伐
item.description: 一些中国出口商正加快将美元收入兑换成人民币，因为他们担心关税导致本币贬值的最坏情况可能已经过去。【原文：A few Chinese exporters are speeding up conversion of their dollar income into yuan on bets the worst of the tariff-led loss in the local currency may be over.】

item.title: 日本担心特朗普关税会将各国推向中国
item.description: 日本执政党政策负责人警告说，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税措施可能会使亚洲各国更加靠近中国，破坏地区安全稳定，并呼吁加强华盛顿与东京之间的防务关系。【原文：US President Donald Trump’s tariffs could push Asian nations closer to China and destabilize regional security, Japan’s ruling party policy chief warned, calling for stronger defense ties between Washington and Tokyo.】

item.title: 澳大利亚的住房危机能否解决？
item.description:
在本周的澳大利亚播客中：主持人克里斯-伯克（Chris Bourke）与格拉坦研究所（Grattan Institute）的布兰登-科茨（Brendan Coates）就联邦大选前各主要政党相互竞争的住房政策进行了对话

。【原文：

On this week’s Australia Podcast: Host Chris Bourke talks to the Grattan Institute’s Brendan Coates about the major parties’ competing housing policies ahead of the federal election

】

item.title: 马来西亚推迟征收新税，因为制造商担心关税受到冲击
item.description: 马来西亚正推迟扩大其销售和服务税的计划，这为正准备应对美国提高关税的制造商提供了暂时的喘息机会。【原文：Malaysia is delaying a planned expansion of its sales and service tax, providing a temporary reprieve for manufacturers bracing for higher US tariffs.】

item.title: 交易员等待美国数据提供关税影响线索，黄金下滑
item.description: 本周的关键经济数据可能会对唐纳德-特朗普总统贸易战的影响提供一些启示，在此之前，黄金走低。【原文：Gold edged lower ahead of key economic data this week that could offer some insights into the impacts of President Donald Trump’s trade war.】

item.title: 关税令雇主恐慌，新西兰就业增长依然疲软
item.description: 由于对国内外经济增长的担忧使雇主不愿招聘，新西兰前三个月的就业人数仅略有增加，这进一步表明劳动力市场的修复尚需时日。【原文：New Zealand’s filled jobs rose only slightly in the first three months, reinforcing signs the labor market will take time to mend as concerns about growth at home and abroad leave employers reluctant to hire.】

item.title: 中国国际金融有限公司（CICC）着眼于中东和东南亚，推进全球业务发展
item.description: 中国最大的经纪公司之一中国国际金融有限公司（China International Capital Corp.【原文：China International Capital Corp., one of the nation’s largest brokerages, is seeking to tap growing demand for cross-border financial services in the Persian Gulf and Southeast Asia as the firm pushes its global expansion.】

item.title: 印尼债券将迎来五个月来首次外资流出
item.description: 由于经济不稳定和印尼盾下跌削弱了投资者的信心，印尼主权债券市场将迎来今年以来的首次月度外资流出。【原文：Indonesia’s sovereign bond market is on course for its first monthly foreign outflows of the year as economic instability and a falling rupiah erode investor confidence.】

item.title: 深假复仇色情法案》将提交特朗普签署
item.description: 美国众议院周一通过立法，打击人工智能生成的未经同意的色情内容（也称为深度伪造的报复性色情内容）的泛滥，并将该法案提交给唐纳德-特朗普总统签署。【原文：The US House on Monday passed legislation to crack down on the proliferation of AI-generated non-consensual pornography, also known as deepfake revenge porn, sending the bill to President Donald Trump’s desk for his signature.】

item.title: 关注美国经济前景和伊朗会谈，石油保持跌势
item.description: 美国经济在酝酿贸易战的过程中出现紧张迹象，与伊朗就其核计划进行的谈判也成为关注焦点。【原文：Oil steadied after a drop, with signs of strain in the US economy amid the brewing trade war and talks with Iran on its nuclear program in focus.】

item.title: 印度 4,890 亿美元的股票大涨正在赢回全球基金的青睐
item.description: 全球基金重返印度股市表明，这个亚洲表现最好的股市近期的涨势可能会延续。【原文：Global funds’ return to Indian equities suggests the likely extension of the recent rally in Asia’s top-performing stock market.】

item.title: 伍德赛德公司批准建设价值 175 亿美元的美国液化天然气项目
item.description: 伍德赛德能源集团有限公司（Woodside Energy Group Ltd.）就价值 175 亿美元的美国液化天然气出口项目做出了最终投资决定，巩固了这家澳大利亚公司作为顶级燃料供应商的地位。【原文：Woodside Energy Group Ltd. made a final investment decision on a $17.5 billion liquefied natural gas export project in the US, cementing the Australian company’s position as a top supplier of the fuel.】

item.title: 美国和墨西哥在贸易谈判前达成关键的水和螺虫协议
item.description: 美国和墨西哥周一就农业部门达成了两项重要协议，平息了因唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收关税而引发的贸易谈判中可能导致邻国间紧张局势升级的冲突。【原文：The US and Mexico reached two key agreements for the agricultural sector on Monday, smoothing over conflicts that threatened to escalate tensions between the neighbors amid trade negotiations brought on by Donald Trump’s tariffs.】

item.title: 关税影响迫在眉睫，亚洲股市步履维艰：市场综述
item.description: 本周，华尔街将公布一系列企业财报和经济数据，这些数据将提供有关唐纳德-特朗普关税战影响的早期指标。【原文：Asian stocks were set for a sluggish open as traders await a slew of corporate earnings and economic data from Wall Street this week that will give early indicators on the impacts of Donald Trump’s tariff war.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利领导的集团资产负债表免除 X 收购债务
item.description: 华尔街银行终于摆脱了 Twitter。【原文：Wall Street banks have finally gotten rid of Twitter.】

item.title: 穆齐尼奇称中国科技企业信用等级或将上调
item.description: Muzinich & Co.公司的一位投资组合经理表示，一些信用评级处于投资级下限的亚洲科技公司可能会在未来两年内升级，因为它们将抓住人工智能的发展机遇。【原文：Some Asian technology companies with credit ratings on the lower end of investment grade may be upgraded within the next two years as they seize on artificial intelligence growth, a portfolio manager at Muzinich & Co. said.】

item.title: 阿布扎比三巨头计划推出由阿联酋货币支持的稳定币
item.description: 包括一家主权财富基金在内的阿布扎比三大实体计划推出一种由阿拉伯联合酋长国中央银行全面监管并由迪拉姆支持的稳定币，此举可能会加快这个波斯湾国家采用数字货币和促进支付的努力。【原文：Three major Abu Dhabi entities, including a sovereign wealth fund, plan to launch a stablecoin fully regulated by the central bank of the United Arab Emirates and backed by the dirham, a move that could speed the Persian Gulf nation’s efforts to adopt digital currencies and facilitate payments.】

item.title: 波音公司被 S&P 评为 "扭亏为盈"，撤出信用观察名单
item.description: 波音公司的债务不再面临被 S&P 全球评级公司（S&P Global Ratings）下调至垃圾级的直接风险，这表明这家飞机制造商在经历了 2024 年艰难的一年之后，在扭亏为盈方面取得了进展。【原文：Boeing Co.’s debt is no longer at immediate risk of being cut to junk status by S&P Global Ratings, a sign of progress in the planemaker’s turnaround after a brutal year in 2024.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴推出最新旗舰人工智能模型，展开后深度学习竞赛
item.description: 阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司（Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.）发布了其旗舰产品 "问问"（Qwen）人工智能模型的新版本，延续了 DeepSeek 之后中国人工智能领域的迅猛发展态势。【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. took the wraps off a new version of its flagship Qwen AI model, sustaining the breakneck pace of development that’s characterized China’s artificial intelligence sphere in the wake of DeepSeek.】

item.title: 加拿大大选结果更新
item.description: 4 月 28 日，阿尔伯塔省卡尔加里，选民在联邦大选期间进入投票站。摄影师：加文-约翰/布鲁姆伯格【原文：Voters enter a polling location during a federal election in Calgary, Alberta, on April 28. Photographer: Gavin John/Bloomberg】

item.title: 恩智浦宣布新任首席执行官，警告 "环境非常不确定
item.description: 恩智浦半导体公司（NXP Semiconductors NV）在其季度收益报告中宣布了新的首席执行官人选，并警告说，由于关税问题，该芯片制造商正处于 "非常不确定的环境 "中。【原文：NXP Semiconductors NV announced a new chief executive officer as part of its quarterly earnings report and warned that the chipmaker was navigating “a very uncertain environment” due to tariffs.】

item.title: 美国关税威胁经济增长，新西兰将收紧预算腰带
item.description: 由于美国的全面关税可能会抑制全球经济增长并危及新西兰的财政复苏，新西兰政府不得不在今年的预算中削减新的支出。【原文：New Zealand’s government has been forced to slash new spending in this year’s budget as sweeping US tariffs threaten to curb global growth and imperil the country’s fiscal recovery.】

item.title: 私人借贷方在重组中将 IDG 债务转为股权
item.description: 据知情人士透露，一批直接贷款人已同意将其对国际数据集团的部分债务转换为股权，这标志着价值 1.6 万亿美元的私人信贷市场出现了最新的重组。【原文：A group of direct lenders have agreed to convert some of their debt for International Data Group into equity, marking the latest restructuring to occur within the $1.6 trillion private credit market, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】
